name: Vanilla Music Player
tagline: A small, fast and free (GPLv3) music player for Android
body:
### The best music player in the whole universe!

...well, maybe not. But it's pretty great.
Here is an insanely big GIF: ![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/bf838b2a283dcc918a32e2facc2f90906ef05bc7/687474703a2f2f692e696d6775722e636f6d2f457738395956462e676966)

# Downloads

Vanilla Music is available via [https://f-droid.org/repository/browse/?fdid=ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla](F-Droid) and [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ch.blinkenlights.android.vanilla&hl=en](Google Play)

# Development
## Source code
Vanilla Music is licensed under the terms of the GPLv3 and hosted on [https://github.com/vanilla-music/vanilla](GitHub).

## Contributing
Please have a look at the [https://github.com/vanilla-music/vanilla/blob/master/README.md#contributing](project README)

## Nightly builds
Nightly builds are available from [http://neo01.eqmx.net/android/vanilla/](http://neo01.eqmx.net/android/vanilla/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
